typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderNumber as string,
		WorkflowStatus as string,
		ApplicationTime as string,
		EmployeeID as string,
		MachineType as string,
		ProcessName as string,
		Building as string,
		Area as string,
		MachineID as string,
		CutterNumber as string,
		CutterName as string,
		CutterSpecification as string,
		CutterProcessLife as string,
		CutterStandardLife as string,
		ExchangeReason as string,
		ExchangeReasonDetails as string,
		Manufacturer as string,
		IsCompliant as string,
		IPQCNumber as string,
		Size as string,
		Appearance as string,
		Calibrator as string,
		ConfirmationDetails as string,
		ReviewResult as string,
		ReviewDetails as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> srccncstatus
srccncstatus sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		Column_24 as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		Column_26 as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		Column_28 as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		Column_30 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['partition-data.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		OrderNumber,
		WorkflowStatus,
		ApplicationTime,
		EmployeeID,
		MachineType,
		ProcessName,
		Building,
		Area,
		MachineID,
		CutterNumber,
		CutterName,
		CutterSpecification,
		CutterProcessLife,
		CutterStandardLife,
		ExchangeReason,
		ExchangeReasonDetails,
		Manufacturer,
		IsCompliant,
		IPQCNumber,
		Size,
		Appearance,
		Calibrator,
		ConfirmationDetails,
		ReviewResult,
		ReviewDetails
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PartitionDataSetCDM
